meanings.definition: A small pin used to secure a tie to a shirt.
meanings.sent1: He carefully placed the tiepins on his tie before heading to the event.
meanings.sent2: She collected various tiepins to match her different ties.
meanings.sent3: The tiepins decided to have a race to see who could secure the tie the fastest.
meanings.sent4: His collection of tiepins was like a colorful bouquet holding his ties together.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming tiepins sparkled under the light, adding elegance to his outfit.
